comments: Lamb (IND) reaches in and makes marginal contact with Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) arm that does not affect his shot near the rim.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) reaches across the front of Lamb (IND), and makes body contact that affects his SQBR.
Bridges (CHA) extends both of his arms into Lamb's (IND) body affects his ability to defend.
Bridges (CHA) cleanly blocks the dunk attempt while Bitadze (IND) is still in possession of the ball.
Smith (CHA) is late to the spot and not established in a legal guarding position at the time of the contact with Bitadze (IND) during his driving shot attempt.
Martin (IND) commits a take foul on Smith (CHA).
Lamb (IND) comes to a jump stop and pivots off of his left foot before releasing his dribble.
Bitadze (IND) is the last to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Lamb (IND) reaches in and makes marginal contact with Ball (CHA).

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Bridges (CHA) is the last to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Lamb (IND) releases from the contact with Martin (CHA) during his stepback move.

Bridges (CHA) is drawn into the air by Wannamaker's (IND) up-fake. Bridges closes out to the side to avoid contact with Wannamaker, who abandons his shot and jumps toward Bridges before passing the ball.
Time expires before Brissett (IND) releases the shot attempt.
